description.oldValue:
With this improved experience, editors will be able to see and request third-party apps while editing the Dashboard for Viva. The "Browse more cards" section will be added in the toolbox, showing up the third-party apps that complement Viva Connections.
GA date: January CY2023
description.newValue: With this improved experience, editors will be able to see and request third-party apps while editing the Dashboard for Viva. The "Browse more cards" section will be added in the toolbox, showing up the third-party apps that complement Viva Connections.
